mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) >= 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IDCHECK FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}

choose.when: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, GEN_CODE, MEM_COMP, MEM_INTRO, MEM_DATE) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memTel}, #{memGen}, #{memComp}, #{memIntro}, sysdate)

INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, GEN_CODE, MEM_COMP, MEM_INTRO, CATE_CODE1, MEM_DATE) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memTel}, #{memGen}, #{memComp}, #{memIntro}, #{memCate1}, sysdate)
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, GEN_CODE, MEM_COMP, MEM_INTRO, CATE_CODE1, CATE_CODE2, MEM_DATE) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memTel}, #{memGen}, #{memComp}, #{memIntro}, #{memCate1}, #{memCate2}, sysdate)
